title: Development Application Credentials + Information Exposed
content:
Issue Description
When I browsed through all the JS files on prow.k8s.io I came across a link called /config which contains a configuration disclosure for the development files

steps: Browse through all the JS files on prow.k8s.io.
Locate and access the /config link which contains the configuration disclosure for the development files.
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves an information disclosure where sensitive configuration details for development files are exposed through a publicly accessible /config link on prow.k8s.io. This exposes internal configurations and credentials that could be exploited by malicious actors.
reason: The discovery of this vulnerability is straightforward as it involves browsing publicly accessible files and locating a specific link. There are no complex interactions or states involved, and the vulnerability is easily identifiable once the /config link is found.
